name: Last Girl On Earth
description:
A game about love and blood ♥️ It's our second Ludum Dare and we are proud to present you "Last Girl On Earth" ! Our Belgian Team 🍻
  • 🖌️ Quentin Cloos : graphics, animations
  • 🎧 Alexandre Meunier : music, sound design, development

For the theme, we mixed a "Tamagotchi like" with a top down shooter !

📜 Story (kind of)

One day, the world woke up with a huge problem : all the girls disappeared except one. No luck for you, it's your girlfriend.

So you did what a sane boyfriend would do in that case : you found a tank and decided to protect the one you love.

Face waves of guys, and give your girlfriend the presents she asks you by clicking on them !

🐞 Known bugs, hidden in corners waiting for their doom :
  • It seems that using  "F" for fullscreen too many times can freeze the computer ! Beware ! (Thanks GameMaker btw)
⚔️ Bugs that we proudly destroyed by stomping them : 
  •  The girl stopped asking presents if you stayed too long on the "Wave Complete" screen
  • Presents give slightly more love when picked up
  • The endless and boring wave loop cycling through time but not space that could occur should rest in peace now
  • No more floating arrows above invisible objects
  • The game icon did not appeared in the task bar due to fullscreen issues
  • The game can now be played properly in windowed mode
💎 Hidden secrets that no one will ever find
  • You can press "R" to restart the game
  • You can press "F" to enter fullscreen
  • You can press "Escape" to exit the game
  • The game is played with only a mouse, and a finger to press on it, or just a finger if you play on mobile, by pressing too by the way
  •  I think that's all you can press in our game
Have fun and remember : if you love someone, buy a tank, we never know.
